pages.text: You can jump vertically using a wall, to get over it. But if wall is slippery, you cannot do this. Don't mistake this for $(l:parcool:actions/horizontal_wall_run)Horizontal Wall Run$().

pages.title: How to Use
pages.text: $(bold)1.$() Look above horizontal line and take running up with $(l:parcool:actions/fast_run)Fast Run$()$(br)$(bold)2.$() Jump onto wall with not releasing jump key.$(br)$(br)It may be little difficult but try it.
